radiographic_examinations.findings: No evidence of ischemia, masses, hemorrhage, or cranial-artery occlusion or stenosis.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI of the head with gadolinium enhancement
radiographic_examinations.findings: Abnormal signal hyperintensity on T2-weighted imaging and FLAIR imaging, and diffusion restriction on diffusion-weighted imaging involving the left temporal lobe; mild diffuse dural enhancement along the left temporal lobe.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Day 8: Extension of signal abnormality. Day 11: New mass effect on the lateral ventricle and 4 mm of midline shift. Day 20: Decrease in mass effect but progressive laminar necrosis. Day 23: Decrease in mass effect but progressive laminar necrosis. Day 80: Near-complete encephalomalacia of the left temporal lobe.
